Title: Crob-surface: Workshop on interacting with multi-device ecologies in the wild
Source: Proc. ACM Int. Conf. Interact. Tabletops Surfaces, ITS
Abstract: © Copyright 2015 by the Abociation for Computing Machinery, Inc. (ACM).In this workshop, we will review and discub opportunities, technical challenges and problems with crob-device interactions in interactive multi-surface and multidevice ecologies. We aim to bring together researchers and practitioners currently working on novel techniques for crob-surface interactions, focusing both on technical as well as interaction challenges for introducing these technologies into the wild, and highlighting opportunities for further research. The workshop will help to facilitate knowledge exchange on the inherent challenges of building robust and intuitive crob-surface interactions, identify application domains and enabling technologies for crob-surface interactions in the wild, and establish a research community to develop effective strategies for succebful design of crob-device interactions.
